titles.title: I've Got A River of Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got a river of life flowing out of me
Makes the lame to walk and the blind to see
Opens prison doors sets the captive free
I've got a river of life flowing out of me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Spring up oh well
Within my soul
Spring up oh well
And make me whole
Spring up oh well
And give to me
That life abundantly
